basics.name: Lokesh Eedara
basics.label: MIS Graduate • AI & Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Master’s student (4.0 GPA) focused on AI/ML, FastAPI, Java/Spring, cloud deploys, and conversational AI with RAG/voice. Built voice-enabled roleplay bots, advising assistants, and production APIs (Render, Docker).

highlights: FastAPI backends with Gemini & Ollama LLMs
Render + Docker deploys for real users
